ygData.subject: Re: Any info on these?
ygData.msgSnippet: At least u been there. I haven t even been inside there. Maybe it s time I camp for the jboots... ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong Technical Support Executive
ygData.messageBody:
At least u been there. I haven't even been inside there. Maybe it's
time I camp for the jboots...

Sereph wrote:
>
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> Just because I stay inside Perma from 20 all the way to 35, don't mean I know the
> place well...... My motto is EverLevel, EverLost remember?
>
> Fesse Estasis, blur cock of EQ STILL, lost in GF for hell's sake
>
> LKW wrote:
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > 1. Slime crystal staff, dropped by a slime element in the bigger slime pool
> > in Runnyeye. Garren know what is the mob lvl?
> >
> > 2. Ice crystal staff, found in Permafrost. Fesse pls provide info so we can
> > go see see look look when camping for runed circlet.
> >
> > 3. The deceiver mask (cant remember exact name, turn u to DE). Dropped by
> > lower guk assasin. Anyone got map to the spot? Also how tough is the
> > assasin?
> >
> > 4. Hidden water tunnel in Paw. It spawns named mobs. Mob lvl not high but
> > was thinking to go there see see look look when too bored in EQ.
> >
> > 5. Polished bone bracer. Dropped by what mob, where?
> >
> > 6. Fesse pls advise me the reasonable price for the following jewelry:
> > - 7int/7str necklace
> > - 4int earring (a pair)
> >
> > 7. Is there any INT bracers out there? Stats? Drop by who and where?
> >
> > Just a feedback, my max dam with less than 30 1HB skill using the staff of
> > writhing is 19 (melee) + 48 (chaotic effect), ie 67 dam per hit. At such a
> > low 1HB skill, the chaotic effect appears like once every 5 fights. I
> > still got 30 skill points with me (after dumping 90 skills points and
> > 200+pp to rise my research skill from zero to 90 odd), wonder if I shld
> > throw them all into 1HB (since I seldom melee but the skill does help alot
> > when I try to kill mob for fractions). Is there any skill a wiz shld look
> > into at mid-30?
> >
> > Ziltus
